resources.string: Camera permission is mandatory to use this application. Review the system settings and allow CD2Spotify to use it.
Error initializing camera. Close any other camera application you have open.
Impossible to read barcodes. Try again later and reboot your phone if it continues failing.
Impossible to authenticate with Spotify. Try again later and reboot your phone if it continues failing.
Cannot find any release information about the barcode read.
Cannot find any album information in Spotify with the data gathered from the barcode
